column1: Under what conditions is an object's finalize() method invoked by the garbage collector?;1When it detects that the object has become unreachable.
column2: 0As soon as object is set as null.
column3: 0At fixed intervalm it checks for null value.

column1: What is a transient variable?;0A transient variable is a variable which is serialized during Serialization.
column2: 1A transient variable is a variable that may not be serialized during Serialization.
column3: 0A transient variable is a variable which is to be marked as serializable.

column1: What is inheritance?;1It is the process where one object acquires the properties of another.
column2: 0inheritance is the ability of an object to take on many forms.
column3: 0inheritance is a technique to define different methods of same type.

column1: What is polymorphism?;0Polymorphism is a technique to define different objects of same type.
column2: 0Polymorphism is the ability of an object to take on many forms.
column3: 0Polymorphism is a technique to define different methods of same type.

column1: What of the following is the default value of an instance variable?;0null
